messages.title: A record of local service for Marchmont and Sciennes
messages.content: A list of Ian Murray's service highlights including helping over 15,000 constituents, speaking to 27,000 constituents on their doorsteps, offering each household a home visit and 10,000 responses, over 1,000 advice sessions - more than any other MP, an award-winning eMagazine for community engagement, and being rated the most responsive MP in Scotland and 15th out of 650 MPs in the UK by MySociety.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Developing a 'Tenement Living' initiative to look at HMOs, repairs, cleaning and neighbourhood issues.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The leaflet emphasizes that the election in Edinburgh South is a straight fight between Ian Murray and the SNP and cautions that a vote for any other party lets the SNP in by the back door.

housing.content: Developing a 'Tenement Living' initiative to look at HMOs, repairs, cleaning and neighbourhood issues; Campaigning against inappropriate planning proposals.

images.caption: Ian Murray pictured outside the Royal Hospital for Sick Children.
